field.comment: If triggered by a specific action, log it
field.name: processActionInstanceId

field.comment: Types can be "flow" when it pertains to flow decisions made by the engine or "information" if it comes from descriptions in blox
field.name: logType

field.comment: A very specific code that can be used to know which data is in the binding
field.name: code

field.comment: Structured metadata that can be used for messaging
field.name: dataBinding
